document.full_text: japan's government maintained its overall view that the economy remained weak in the aftermath of the march earthquake, but downgraded its assessment of capital spending in a monthly report published on tuesday.
document.title: japan keeps overall economy assessment but cuts capex view
lines_and_colors: japan's government maintained its overall view that the economy remained weak in the aftermath of the march earthquake, but downgraded its assessment of capital spending in a monthly report published on tuesday.
